strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Itâ€™s Friday! Here are a few ideas for your weekend: 

  • Folk out: Enjoy three days of the best regional and national folk music during The Ozark Folk Festival this weekend, Nov 10-12, in Eureka Springs. 
  • We salute you: Prairie Grove Battlefield State Park will present a Veterans Day ceremony on Nov 11 from 8-9a. 
  • Starships: Multiple meteor showers will be visible this Saturday, Nov 12, and Hobbs State Park is hosting a viewing party beginning at 4:30p. 
  • Kickin it: Razorback Soccer earned its seventh straight bid to the NCAA Tournament and will face Missouri State in the first round tonight at 6:30. 
  • Jingle jangle: Shop, mingle, and maybe even have a Hallmark moment during the NWA Holiday Market this weekend, Nov 11-12 at the NWA Convention Center in Springdale. 

Stay warm out there! See you on Monday.
